definition: to wash/to clean out/to cleanse/to eliminate/to dredge

sentences.english: They had been working in the stream for a week but they hadn't panned out.
sentences.chinese: 他們在那條小河裏淘洗了一個星期，但沒有淘出金子。
他們的工作就是“淘洗沙子”。

sentences.english: There should also be a sand exhausting ditch in front of the washing pond in order to remove impurities.
sentences.chinese: 在第一個淘洗池前方還需另設一排沙槽，以清除雜物。

sentences.english: Wheat to washing clean, the temperature at 30 ℃ under the cover cloth germination.
sentences.chinese: 麥子要淘洗乾淨，在30℃的溫度下蓋溼布發芽。

sentences.english: After three rounds biopanning, the phage clones have enriched.
sentences.chinese: 通過三輪生物淘洗過程，噬菌體克隆得到富集。

sentences.english: They cradled the gold to separate the gold.
sentences.chinese: 他們淘洗金沙，把金子分離出來。

sentences.english: The only way to find this gold was by panning .
sentences.chinese: 尋找黃金的唯一方法是用鍋來淘洗。

sentences.english: Fiber index is measured using the conical elutriation method.
sentences.chinese: 纖維指數用圓錐淘洗法測量。

sentences.english: Used for washing porcelain clay and stuff like that.
sentences.chinese: 用來淘洗瓷土等原料的。

definition: to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
